{"id":721507741,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1655150109,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721507741/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int maxl = height[0];\n        int maxr = height[height.size()-1];\n        int left = 0;\n        int res = 0;\n        int right = height.size()-1;\n        while (left < right) {\n            if (height[left] <= height[right]) {\n                res += (maxl - height[left]) > 0 ? maxl - height[left] : 0;\n                left++;\n            }else{\n                res += (maxr - height[right]) > 0 ? maxr - height[right] : 0;\n                right--;\n            }\n            maxl = max(maxl, height[left]);\n            maxr = max(maxr, height[right]);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
